title: Short Answer Questions
instructions: Provide detailed answers to the following questions. Readjust the text box size as needed

questions.prompt: What factors led to the crash of the video game industry beginning in 1983? (5 pts)
Describe Emergent Gameplay. Provide an example. (10 pts)
Describe negative and positive feedback loops. Give one an example for each. (15 pts)
Pick a genre. Discuss design principles in that genre and give an example of a game using those principles. (15 pts)
Choose one of the trade offs in game design we discussed. Explain what it means and use a video game example to elaborate on this point. (15 pts)
List two indicators of poor game design. Explain why they are indicators of poor design and give video game examples that demonstrate these. (15 pts)

Write your gamer type(s). Discuss a game that you have played and how it appealed to your listed gamer type(s) and motivations. Also, discuss a game you have played that did not appeal to you and how that lines up with your gamer type(s) and motivations. (25 pts)
